Identification_Area.title: Description of Lamont/NSSDC AHFE data tapes

Citation_Information.description: This PDF/A document provides the description of the format, organization, and content of the original magnetic data tapes from the Apollo 15 and Apollo 17 Heat Flow Experiment archived at the NASA National Space Science Data Center (NSSDC) under the NSSDC data set IDs PSPG-00093 and PSPG-00022, respectively (old NSSDC IDs 71-063C-06A and 72-096C-01A). This document was provided by the NSSDC. (This text is taken directly from the label in PDS3 set A17A-L-HFE-3-THERMAL-CONDUCTIVITY.)

Document.description: This PDF/A document provides the description of the format, organization, and content of the original magnetic data tapes from the Apollo 15 and Apollo 17 Heat Flow Experiment archived at the NASA National Space Science Data Center (NSSDC) under the NSSDC data set IDs PSPG-00093 and PSPG-00022, respectively (old NSSDC IDs 71-063C-06A and 72-096C-01A). This document was provided by the NSSDC. (This text is taken directly from the label in PDS3 set A17A-L-HFE-3-THERMAL-CONDUCTIVITY.)
